title.rendered: Reassuring Transparency: Our Cookies Policy Made Simple

content.rendered:
Cookie Policy

Effective Date: 09/06/2025
Business Name: Hexivox Ltd
Website: hexivox.com

This Cookies Policy explains how we use cookies and similar technologies on our website. By continuing to browse or use our site, you consent to the use of cookies as described here.

1. What Are Cookies?

Cookies are small text files that websites place on your device when you visit them. They help websites remember your preferences, understand user behaviour, and improve functionality.

2. Types of Cookies We Use

We may use the following types of cookies on our site:

🔹 Essential Cookies

These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly and cannot be turned off in our systems.
Examples: remembering your privacy preferences, logging in securely, submitting forms.

🔹 Performance & Analytics Cookies

These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting anonymous data (e.g. pages visited, time spent on site).
Example: Google Analytics.

🔹 Functionality Cookies

These cookies enable enhanced features and personalisation, such as remembering your preferences or displaying embedded content (e.g. YouTube videos or Instagram feeds).

🔹 Marketing & Third-Party Cookies

These may be set by advertising or social media platforms to deliver relevant ads or allow content sharing.
Examples: Facebook Pixel, Google Ads.

3. Third-Party Cookies

Some cookies may be placed by third-party services we use on our website (such as video embeds, maps, or analytics tools). These third parties have their own privacy policies and cookie practices, which we encourage you to review.

4. How You Can Control Cookies

You can manage or delete cookies via your browser settings. Most browsers let you:

  • See what cookies you have and delete them
  • Block third-party cookies
  • Block all cookies
  • Clear all cookies when you close the browser

Note: Disabling some cookies may affect website functionality.

You can also opt out of Google Analytics tracking using this tool:
👉 https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout

5. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Cookies Policy from time to time. The most recent version will always be posted on this page with the effective date clearly stated.

6. Contact Us

If you have any questions about our use of cookies or this policy, please contact:

📧 Email: admin@hexivox.com
📞 Phone: 07359949371
📍 Address: 47 Chestnut Way, Scunthorpe, DN16 HA
